data.title: Units 7-10 Discovery Way, Horam, TN21 0GE
data.meta_description: A brand new high-quality business park under construction offering a total of 4 office premises over the ground and first floors. Each office wi...
data.text:
Situated on the western side of Little London Road just south of the junction with the B2203 Heathfield Road, approximately 5 miles north of Hailsham and the A22 and 2 miles south of Heathfield. Horam is a rapidly growing village with various new housing developments underway. The village high street benefits from all the usual conveniences and services.

** Please note â€“ if using a Sat Nav the site might be found using TN21 0JB as the postcode **
